item.title: 21 Dec 2017 04:08
item.description:
Hiking boots and a hyper light and insanely mean vest from Eddie bauer, A month's wall climbing membership, A huge bag of snacks, ginger ale and carbonated water, Nautilus Prime subscription and an inflatable two seater kayak! PHEW! This December I've received a ton more than what I've given! #gifts

PHEW! This December I've received a ton more than what I've given! #gifts
